title: Diamond Nagas Pendant - Exquisite Half Moon Vaddanam Design
materials: High-Quality Sparkling Diamonds with excellent clarity and cut. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Intricately designed Nagas work pendant inspired by traditional South Indian vaddanam (waist belt) motifs. Features a delicate half-moon shape adorned with floral and geometric diamond settings. The design incorporates traditional Telugu craftsmanship for a timeless appeal.
colors: Predominantly Gold and White (Diamond). The combination provides a classic and sophisticated look.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also suitable for festive celebrations like Sankranti or Ugadi. A beautiful addition to bridal jewelry or to elevate everyday wear.
description: This Nagas pendant seamlessly blends traditional design with modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality diamonds and 22K gold ensures lasting brilliance and value. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a vibrant and enduring shine. A versatile piece that honors South Indian heritage.
